SEARCH
Package view.Doctor.appointments

Class DoctorUpdateOutcomeDetailsView

java.lang.Object
view.View
view.Doctor.appointments.DoctorUpdateOutcomeDetailsView
public class DoctorUpdateOutcomeDetailsView extends View
DoctorUpdateOutcomeDetailsView is a View that allows doctors to update the outcomes of fulfilled appointments.
Since:
2024-11-17
